[@statechannels/channel-client](./channel-client.md) &gt; [ChannelClient](./channel-client.channelclient.md)

## ChannelClient class

Class that wraps the channel-provider's JSON-RPC interface and exposes a more convenient API

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ChannelClient implements ChannelClientInterface 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ChannelClientInterface](./channel-client.channelclientinterface.md)
